articles.title: Voters turn out in record numbers in France's high-stakes snap election - Financial Times
articles.description: More than a quarter of votes already cast by noon, the highest turnout in more than four decades
articles.content:
French voters on Sunday morning turned out in record numbers in the first round of a high-stakes snap election that could usher in a far-right government and shake the EU to its core.
